defun basic.description: Simple - Defines a new function in the global environment.

defun with patterns.description: With patterns - Defines a new function with patterns.

if.description: Allows the execution of a form to be dependent on a single test-form.

cond.description: Allows the execution of forms to be dependent on test-form.

let.description: Creates new variable bindings and performs the bindings in parallel.

let*.description: Creates new variable bindings and performs the bindings sequentially.

lambda.description: Provides a shorthand notation for a function special form involving a lambda expression.

export.description: There can be multiple export declarations within module declaration.

defrecord.description: Provides a shorthand notation for a function special form involving a lambda expression.
